attributes.review: Hey guys i only wanted to get an app that would keep me up to date on the GREATEST president in the whole WORLD! but to my appall someone had downloaded a TERRIBLE virus in this app! the app starting flashing and blaring the chinese national anthem so loudly that my hamster had a seizure ğŸ˜¡ and then 24 hours later the CHINESE POLICE WERE AT MY DOORSTEP accusing me of supporting a fascist racist homophobic sex offender as a president! thankfully, these comments made my conservative hamster so mad (because that statement was true and he had nothing to defend the president with ğŸ˜¢ğŸ˜¢) he arose from the dead and fought off the chinese police while screaming TRUMP 2020! Anyways, totally get this craphole app if you want a virus installed on your phone.
